name: items
description: Array of breadcrumbs item objects. This should contain all pages in the breadcrumb except for the parent page.

params.name: text
params.description: Text to use within the breadcrumbs item.

params.name: href
params.description: The value of the breadcrumb item link href attribute.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the individual crumb.

name: text
description: Text to use for the parent page.

name: href
description: The value of the parent page link href attribute.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the container.
